name: Aviator - Bush Pilot
description: As the busy operator of a hangar and runway in the heart of a region like the Serengeti, there are countless ways to earn a living. As an ‘old school’ bush pilot, you must undertake challenging jobs to make the lives of both tourists and locals a lot easier.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows: XP / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core (Intel Core 2 Duo, AMD Athlon X2) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 260 / Radeon HD 4850, Shader Modell 2.0 or higher with latest driver DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows: XP / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core (Intel Core i5, AMD Phenom X4) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 560 / Radeon HD 7790, Shader Modell 3.0 or higher with latest driver DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Aviator - Bush Pilot: so much promise, so little delivered, typical of UIE.  to sum it up,'terrible, just terrible'  the BAD: + framerate is horrible, making smooth flight impossible - tried a number of configurations and none of them helped. + dodgy GPS locator in flight  the GOOD: + actually looks OK IMHO + if the framerate was not so bad, the controls would be just fine + Actually has radio channels and the ability to stream your own music  I wish they had optimised the game before giving us streaming music..!  It's a shame as the framerate ruins the game totally.  -10/10 AVOID (get for the cards only ..maybe..)
poor graphic quality, poor control, cannot costomise control button, cannot choose mission youself
Really bad game. Lots of lag, buggy, really messy and boring. Even for a free game it'd not be worth playing.
